title: Hello Goodboy
description:
Hello Goodboy is a heartwarming, wholesome adventure featuring Iko, a boy new to the afterlife. With no memory of what brought him to the world beyond, he must rely on Coco, a strangely familiar dog who will help him solve the mysteries of this new existence
Journey through unknown, yet familiar places, meeting fellow souls on their own adventures through the afterlife . Pay it forward with generous favors for them and try to figure out just why Iko landed in the land beyond to begin with. However, mind the time: thereâ€™s only so much of it FAKE SIGNALS
